feed.title: GitHub Open Policy Agent Daily Trending
feed.subtitle: Daily Trending of Open Policy Agent in GitHub

entry.title: aws-samples/aws-infra-policy-as-code-with-terraform
entry.summary: Implements OPA-based preventive security controls for AWS Infrastructure using Terraform Infrastructure as Code (IaC), that can establish a security baseline and safeguard resources before deployment into the AWS Accounts and reduce security risks.
